00013 App::App() {

00015     height = 480;

00019     myMesh = new Mesh();

00023

00025     myMesh->calculateNormals();

00028     angle = new Delta_Functor(
00029         0,      //Start time
00030         10000,  //End time
00031         0,      //Start value
00032         360,    //Final value
00033         1       //What curve to take
00034     );
00035 
00036     //Make it cyclical so that he will keep spinning
00037     angle->makeCyclic();

00040     GUI * myGUI = new GUI();

00091 void App::display() {
00092 
00093     //Draw the current mesh
00094     glPushMatrix(); {
00095         //Set his color (1,1,0 = Yellow)
00096         glColor3d(1,1,0);
00097 
00098         //Make him big
00099         double scaleFactor = 2;
00100         glScaled(scaleFactor, scaleFactor, scaleFactor);
00101 
00102         //Move to the center
00103         glTranslated(0,0,0);
00104 
00105         //Rotate according to the delta functor defined in init
00106 
00107         glRotated(angle->getValue(), 1,1,0);
00108         glRotated(angle->getValue(), 0,1,1);
00109         glRotated(angle->getValue(), 1,0,1);
00110 
00111         //lets rotate so that it/he/she is looking at us
00112         glRotated(135, 0,0,1);
00113 
00114 
00115         //Draw mesh
00116         if (!myMesh->drawMesh()) {
00117             //If things go bad we should cry out in pain
00118             printf("AHHHHHH PAIN!!!! drawmesh in App::display()");
00119         }
00120     }
00121     glPopMatrix();
00122 }
